description: AbstractBuildingSubdivision is the abstract superclass for different kinds of logical building subdivisions.

properties.name: class
properties.description: Indicates the specific type of the building subdivision.

properties.name: function
properties.description: Specifies the intended purposes of the building subdivision.

properties.name: usage
properties.description: Specifies the actual uses of the building subdivision.

properties.name: elevation
properties.description: Specifies qualified elevations of the building subdivision in relation to a well-defined surface which is commonly taken as origin (e.g. geoid or water level).

properties.name: sortKey
properties.description: Defines an order among the objects that belong to the building subdivision. An example is the sorting of storeys.

properties.name: buildingConstructiveElement
properties.description: Relates the constructive elements to the building subdivision.

properties.name: buildingFurniture
properties.description: Relates the furniture objects to the building subdivision.

properties.name: buildingInstallation
properties.description: Relates the installation objects to the building subdivision.

properties.name: buildingRoom
properties.description: Relates the rooms to the building subdivision.
